did.unittitle: University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg, UPG Staff Association
did.abstract: Administrative Records of the UPG Staff Association of the University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg, 1990-2016.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: All rights reserved. University of Pittsburgh.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Transferred from the UPG Staff Association to the UPG Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg, UPG Staff Association, 1990-2016, UPG.RG.40, UPG Archives, University of Pittsburgh Library System.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Frank Zabrosky in 2019.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: By-laws, Elections, Officers, Minutes, Committees, Financial Reports, Memoranda, Report to the Advisory Board of UPG, News Releases, News Clippings

otherfindaid.head: See Also
otherfindaid.p: See also, UPG Archives UPG.RG.60 DVD [DVD+R]23, Retrospective 30 June (2012) Retirees.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges -- Pennsylvania -- Greensburg -- Records and correspondence
Universities and colleges -– Pennsylvania -– Greensburg -– Administration

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Committee appointed in 1998 by Dr. Frank A. Cassell, President of UPG, to determine UPG staff interest in a [staff] association, formulating tentative by-laws, seeking staff support, and organizing the initial election of officers which took place in early 1999. Original members of the committee were: Joyce Bucchi, Karen Antoniak, Gerry Enlow, and Karen Gavula.

File contains: Dec. 11, 1998, call for a Staff Association Meeting at which a working draft of the Staff Association's By-laws was to be discussed; partial responses to a Staff Concerns Questionnaire; memo dtd 3/22/99 from Dr. Frank A. Cassell, in re the election of UPG Staff Association officers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Includes: Working Draft, 12/4/98; Draft, 2/4/99; Memo dtd. 11/12/04 from Tom Horan to Karen Gavula in re "changing the By-laws to make the length of office two years instead of one"; University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg Staff Association By-Laws, Dec. 15, 2004.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Restricted Access. [Access restricted to UPG Administrative Personnel.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Contains: nomination forms; forms for individuals nominated to accept or decline the nominations; specimen election ballots; election results; rosters of UPG Non-Union Staff.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: President: Michele Tracy; Vice President: Tanya Conde; Treasurer: Suzanne Dominick; Secretary: Karen Mays

did.unittitle: Minutes of UPG Staff Association Meetings

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Includes notices of meetings, agendas, minutes of meetings; University Times story of Pitt Staff Assoc. All-Campus Meeting 6/11/09, "Campus Staff Leaders: Morale a concern."

did.unittitle: Minutes of UPG Staff Association Meetings

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: File Contains: minutes of committee meetings; committee correspondence; invitations; certificate of appreciation; PowerPoint Presentation; photo disc ID of individuals; expenses; maintenance requests.

Care Package Drive, 2003 [conducted for UPG student, Marine Lance Corporal James R. Preisach. Folder includes ltr of thanks and appreciation from JRP to Dr. Frank Cassell in which JRP comments on his change of opinion about the war in Iraq.]
Salvation Army, Nov. 2000-2003 [Thanksgiving Food Baskets, Easter Food Baskets.]
Staff Association Council, University of Pittsburgh, Oakland Campus. 1999, 2004-2005
Staff Classification System, Univ. of Pgh. Rev. 1999
Staff Handbook, Univ. of Pittsburgh. January, 1990
Cathy and Dave Schmitt Retirement Reception, 2004

File folder also includes two memoranda: 10/1/01, thank you for supporting UPG Staff Assoc. Activities its fundraising activities (contributions included $100 to the Juvenile Diabetes Walk, 9/22/02; $100 to the Tosatto Memorial Scholarship Endowment; $100 to the Rossetti International Study Endowment; approximately $260 to the Make-A-Wish Project)
Memo 11/19/01 in re Candy Bar Sale ($500 donated to the Attack on America Fund)
Judicial Appeals Committee seeking 3 staff members to form a standing committee

Memorandum dtd 12/17/01 from UPG Staff Assoc. Issues and Concerns Committee and UPG Off. of Human Resources to Dr. Frank Cassell. Subj.: Waiver of Part-time Fees [for UPG Staff members who are also part time UPG students]
Card of thanks (undtd) from New Beginnings clubhouse, West Place Drop In Center

otherfindaid.head: See Also
otherfindaid.p: See also, UPG Archives UPG.RG.60 DVD [DVD+R]23, Retrospective 30 June (2012) Retirees.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: File contains: Memo 1/3/01 in re process for sending/distributing Staff Assoc. announcements, minutes of meetings, etc.; draft dtd 1/31/01 of Communications Committee Mission Statement; e-mail dtd 2/23/01 from Karen Antoniak in reply to Karen Gavula's request for "kind of information" is given to new employees; agenda for Communications Committee mtng of 2/27/01.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Includes: Summary of individual pay relative to the maximum of a range for Univ. of Pgh. Classified employees, rev. 2/12/03; 5/14/2003 from Joyce Bucchi, subject "University Staff Handbook Updates (1) Use of Sick Time and FMLA and (2) Disciplinary Guidelines; memo dtd 9/22/03 from Dr. Cassell to Brandi Darr, subject, "Staff Participation in Campus Events"; completed copy of Sarbanese-Oxley Act of 2002 Questionnaire 7/18/05 [signed certification that financial statements are free of material misstatements or omissions].

did.unittitle: Report to the Advisory Board of UPG
Report to the Advisory Board of UPG

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: [11-12-03] [Subject: Review of UPG Staff Association activities during 2003/04] Sent for inclusion in [University of Pittsburgh] SAC Newsletter. [2-19-04] [Subject: Review of UPG Staff Association activities during 2004/05]
